entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-12-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullableWalker: it looks like VisitDelegateCreationExpression doesn't re-infer nullability of the source Invoke method #58489
  • Use 'is null' check is suggesting 'is null' instead of 'is object' #58483
  • Roslyn incorrectly report some API as `Not Available ⚠` in IntelliSense list for mulit targetframeworks projects #58478

Closed

  • IDE0060 (unused param) with NotImplementedException #56317
    Backlog
  • Roslyn Analyzer not clearing last diagnostic #53192
    17.1
  • Ternary type inference failure #58485
  • Stuck diagnostics #51214
    Backlog
  • Analyzer called twice with same RecordDeclaration SyntaxNode #50989
    Backlog
  • Tab to insert new method for event handler crashed with top-level statements #49325
    Backlog
  • Error list sometimes hides warnings for minutes after building the solution, and the warning count doesn't match #51549
    Backlog
  • The comments in AnalysisContext do not match interface methods #51771
    Backlog
  • if you have: `readonly ref int x = ref y` does this count as a read/write ref now? or just a read-ref? It should be the latter. Can you check, fix if necessary, and add test? #58466
  • event handlers are not generated in top level programs. #58474

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable indenter tests #58488
    Area-IDE
  • Use relative indentation for embedded statements #58487
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid duplicate syntax node callbacks for record declarations #58482
    Area-Analyzers, Area-Compilers, 17.1

Merged

  • Fix unused param (IDE0060) false positive #58480
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Enqueue additional and analyzer config documents in WorkCoordinator #58479
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Remove redundant MethodKind parameter #58481
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Support top level statements in event hookup #58475
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix event hookup at the end of a document #58477
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Semi auto implemented properties #57076
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Cache the delegate for static method group conversions. #58288
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Add support for interpolations in raw string literals. #57979
    Area-Compilers
  • Add GlassTestsHotReloadService external access #58456
    Area-Infrastructure
